      static boolean isDataAvailable() 
      static void reinitialize()
      Method forces a resynchronization on all remote registries.
      static void shutdown()
      Method shutdown all registry instances.
      static void waitForData()
      Method only returns if all available registries are synchronized.
      static void waitUntilReady()
      Method blocks until all registries are not handling any tasks and are all consistent.

      • shutdown

        public static void shutdown()
        Method shutdown all registry instances. Please use method with care! Make sure no other instances are using the cached remote instances before shutdown. There is generally no need for the manual registry shutdown because the registries take care of the shutdown.

      • waitForData

        public static void waitForData()
                        throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException,
                               InterruptedException
        Method only returns if all available registries are synchronized.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        InterruptedException - is thrown if thread is externally interrupted.

      • isDataAvailable

        public static boolean isDataAvailable()

      • reinitialize

        public static void reinitialize()
                         throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException,
                                InterruptedException
        Method forces a resynchronization on all remote registries.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        InterruptedException

      • waitUntilReady

        public static void waitUntilReady()
                           throws InterruptedException,
                                  org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        Method blocks until all registries are not handling any tasks and are all consistent.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - is thrown in case the thread was externally interrupted.
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown if the wait could not be performed.
